hooks.command: bash -c 'cd /home/user/vibed-nix && ./install-nix.sh && NIX_BIN=$(find /nix/store -path "*/nix-*/bin" -type d | sort -r | head -1) && if [ -d "$NIX_BIN" ]; then echo "export PATH=\"$NIX_BIN:\$PATH\"" >> "$CLAUDE_ENV_FILE" && echo "export NIX_CONF_DIR=\$HOME/.config/nix" >> "$CLAUDE_ENV_FILE"; fi'

bash -c 'cd /home/user/vibed-nix && NIX_BIN=$(find /nix/store -path "*/nix-*/bin" -type d | sort -r | head -1) && if [ -d "$NIX_BIN" ]; then export PATH="$NIX_BIN:$PATH" && export NIX_CONF_DIR=$HOME/.config/nix && $NIX_BIN/nix develop /home/user/vibed-nix --command bash -c "env" | grep -E "^(PATH|.*NIX.*|.*SHELL.*)=" | while IFS= read -r line; do echo "export $line" >> "$CLAUDE_ENV_FILE"; done; fi'
